+#ifndef TENSORFLOW_JAVA_SRC_GEN_CC_JAVA_OSTREAM_H_
+#define TENSORFLOW_JAVA_SRC_GEN_CC_JAVA_OSTREAM_H_
+
+#include <string>
+#include <set>
+#include <vector>
+
+#include "tensorflow/java/src/gen/cc/source_writer.h"
+#include "tensorflow/java/src/gen/cc/java_defs.h"
+
+namespace tensorflow {
+namespace java {
+
+// A base class for writing Java source code using a stream-like API.
+//
+// It wraps a SourceWriter and exposes a set of basic operations for writing
+// Java-specific features.
+class JavaOutputStream {
body: Of course, I'm open to any of your suggestions! I just created a doc (you should have received the link) where I've explained some of my design decisions in regard of this PR and the previous one. Looking forward to your comments!
